nodes.text: Main Boulevard was the central road of the city of Theed on Naboo. It lead from the Palace Plaza to the intricate ceremonial gates of Theed. It ended in Main Boulevard Bridge, which crossed one of the Solleu River's tributaries.
In 32 BBY, during the Invasion of Naboo, the Main Boulevard and its bridge served as the primary causeway for a column of the Trade Federation's invading Droid Army.
